email_chain.subject: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. We have a vessel available for your crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. The vessel is the MV Ocean Star, a 150,000 DWT tanker with an LOA of 280 meters. The laycan is October 15-20. The starting freight rate is $52.50 per metric ton. Let me know if this works for you or if you need further details. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the offer. The laycan works for us, but the freight rate is a bit high. We were hoping for something in the low 50s, say $50.75 per metric ton. Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your response. I can bring the freight rate down to $51.00 per metric ton, which is competitive given the current market. The demurrage rate is $15,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $51.00 is acceptable. However, we would like to cap the demurrage at $12,000 per day. Can you confirm if this is possible? Also, please send over the full vessel details and laytime specifics. Thanks, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I can agree to cap the demurrage at $12,000 per day. Attached are the full vessel details and laytime specifics. The laytime will start on October 15 and end on October 20. Please review and let me know if everything is in order. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, everything looks good. Let’s proceed with the freight rate of $51.00 per metric ton and the demurrage capped at $12,000 per day. Please send over the contract for review. Thanks, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear. I’ll have the contract sent over to you by end of day. Thanks for your cooperation and looking forward to working together on this shipment. Best, Sarah
